rnal* knowledge about one's self. Judge > not, lest ye be judged--remember =

y hand, producing what some consider to be results__. As I > > expected, th=
e __samples that people have sent me__ are nothing more > than > > __timed =
radio scans that have no validity__. > > > > What is important to remember,=
 before purchasing any of these > replica > > devices, is that __the Spirit=

plained__ that the way that the > Telephone > > to the Dead technology work=
s, is by spirit energy manipulating the > > random voltage generator (RVG) =
and using white and pink noise, as > > well as radio fragment, to create re=
al time voice answers to > > questions posed from our side. __The most impo=
rtant aspect to this > > device__ is __the medium operator__ who works as a=
n antenna > > or "__interpreter" for living individuals asking the question=

h the > > Telephone to the Dead, stated__ that there were only __thirty of =
these > > individuals__ that __could effectively use the device__. Four hav=
e been > > identified to this point. > > > > __I have spent nearly four yea=
rs testing and doing paranormal > research > > with the Telephone to the De=
ad, and I have built strong > relationships > > with Spirit Technicians and=
 Spirit Guides who I trust, and who > trust > > me__. These new "__radio sc=
anners" are not only a waste of money__ for > > people looking to __do rese=
arch with them__ in hopes of having > effective > > communication with the =
other side, but may __in fact be very > dangerous. > > Should demonic and o=
ther negative entities__ learn to use these __false > > devices, the result=
s could be devastating__. Though I rarely see eye > to > > eye with __the C=
atholic Church on the matter of using the Telephone > to > > the Dead__, I =
do admit that __they predicted__ the widespread sale of > __false > > commu=
nication devices__ as far back as last year. I have recently > begun > > to=
 __receive requests from individuals asking for help__ to close > > __negat=
ive doorways and portals__ that __they believe__ they opened using > > thei=
r __purchased__ Telephone to the Dead __replica__. Others are claiming > > =
that I am a fraud because their __purchased device doesn't produce > the > =
> __positive results I have been fortunate enough to have__, and __claim__ =

see this spiraling out of control already__. Once again, __I will > > conti=
nue__ my research with the __actual Telephone to the Dead__ as well > as > =

uly > > interested__ in real time spirit communication. Please feel free to=
